title: A New Twist on the Shroud is Satanic Machination
author: Rob

title: A New Twist on the Shroud is Satanic Machination
post: I cannot stomach such a presentation at all.  I find the idea to be ignorant and without basis in the real world.
author: Andy

title: A New Twist on the Shroud is Satanic Machination
post: Did the man identify himself? He is an amateur, possibly a fundamentalist, and therefore makes serious mistakes, particularly when it comes to Pope Francis. He should know why Prince Charles said that all those things, Great Britain is now a multi-cultural society.
author: Louis
